name: Lost Station (Scanax)
description:
You are building a defense for the lost but incredibly important space station Artifact. Enemies attack from all sides, combat forces are limited, but it is necessary to hold out as long as possible.

    Management is carried out using the console. There are currently three commands available:
move A1 B2 - moving a unit from sector A1 to sector B2;
status - health of the station; status A1 - unit's specifications from sector A1
help - show two previous commands :);

    It's our first project and we made it for "Mini Jam 63: Future", we tried our best. A game has bugs which we will fix in updates. Also we will add new commands and diversify the gameplay. We hope you'll enjoy it. Also we look forward to your feedback.

Developers: Scanax & maksanm

P.S. Our highscore is 04:33 ! Try to beat it ;)
